Title: Multi-wavelength Photometry and Progenitor Analysis of the Nova V906 Car 
Authors: Wee J., Blagorodnova N., Penprase B.E., Facey J.P., Morioka T., 
    Corbett H., Barlow B.N., Kupfer T., Law N.M., Ratzloff J.K., Howard W.S., 
    Gonzalez Chavez R., Glazier A., Vasquez Soto A., Horiuchi T. 
Table: Data behind Figure 3 -- ANDICAM + CTIO Yale SMARTS 1.3m Telescope optical light curves
================================================================================
Byte-by-byte Description of file: v906car_op_published_mrt.txt
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   Bytes Format Units Label  Explanations
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   1-  9 F9.3   d       MJD    Modified Julian Date, JD-2,400,000.5
  11- 16 F6.3   mag     Bmag   Johnson B band ANDICAM/1.3m magnitude
  18- 22 F5.3   mag   E_Bmag   Upper uncertainty in Bmag
  24- 28 F5.3   mag   e_Bmag   Lower uncertainty in Bmag
  30- 34 F5.3   mag     Vmag   Johnson V band ANDICAM/1.3m magnitude
  36- 40 F5.3   mag   E_Vmag   Upper uncertainty in Vmag
  42- 46 F5.3   mag   e_Vmag   Lower uncertainty in Vmag
  48- 52 F5.3   mag     Rmag   Cousins R band ANDICAM/1.3m magnitude
  54- 58 F5.3   mag   E_Rmag   Upper uncertainty in Rmag
  60- 64 F5.3   mag   e_Rmag   Lower uncertainty in Rmag
  66- 70 F5.3   mag     Imag   Cousins I band ANDICAM/1.3m magnitude
  72- 76 F5.3   mag   E_Imag   Upper uncertainty in Imag
  78- 82 F5.3   mag   e_Imag   Lower uncertainty in Imag
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
